snippet: David Ortiz doubled in the go-ahead run for his seventh consecutive hit as host Boston won its third straight game over Tampa Bay.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Boston Red Sox defeat Tampa Bay Rays, 6-4; Red Sox first baseman David Ortiz has another impressive outing; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: David Ortiz doubled in the go-ahead run for his seventh consecutive hit as host Boston won its third straight game over Tampa Bay.

headline.seo: Ortiz Stays Hot as Red Sox Beat Rays Again
headline.main: Ortiz Stays Hot as Red Sox Get Past the Rays Again
headline.print_headline: Ortiz Stays Hot as Red Sox Get Past the Rays Again
